title: WHY REAPER SORAKA IS UNAVAILABLE ON PBE?

replies.body: Also, why should it be? Soraka hasn't been changed at all recently, there's no reason to test her reaper skin...
'cause a lot of people think PBE is the unlimited currency playground rather than a testing biz.
i know right.I'm just new to pbe so i thought all skin from LOL is available there..

Hey wayne22,

Our goal with PBE is to keep is as close (mirrored) to live as possible, which means that legacy skins won't be available all year round. 

In the future, if you've got questions regarding PBE, I'd suggest asking them on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/)! Many of the players there know a lot about how things are done, and can answer most questions. :]
well then why are king rammus and riot squad singed available on pbe atm?
If I had to guess, it's because those are skins that were given out (Rammus in closed beta, and Riot Squad Singed at PAX), and weren't only available in the store.

Are you referring to how Haunted Zyra is always available? No, at this time, we don't have plans to make Reaper Soraka available all year round; she'll remain Legacy. 

I'm not on the champion team, so I may not be the best to comment on your suggestions, if they're in regards to Soraka and not one of her skins. For something like this, I'd recommend making a new post in [Gameplay & Balance](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance).
